description: A humorous punchline about the length of a nose.
title: A Foot of Nose
n_1: Dad and Kid are talking at the kitchen table.
c1_1: Hey, do you know why your nose can't be 12 inches long?
n_2: Dad grins, ready to deliver the punchline.
c1_2: Because then it'd be a foot!
n_3: They both laugh together at the joke.
n_4: Dad and Kid continue their conversation, smiling.
